summary: Adds a simple follower to \"The Drunken Huntsman\" in Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
This is the first (follower) mod I\'ve ever made, so it\'s nothing special. It just adds a simple follower to Skyrim, so if you\'re looking for a \"generic\" male companion to travel with you on your adventures this one might be a good choice. 
Aldemar is a young Nord warrior and he is equipped with a set of iron armor, sword and a shield. He is most effective with shield+sword but he\'s also a good Archer.
He starts at level 10 and will level up to level 60. (Note: AFT removes the level cap for followers) 
At level 60 these skills will be maxed: Onehanded, Archery, Block, Heavy Armor and Sneak.
His health at lvl 60 is 838 and his Stamina 347, making him better than most vanilla followers but not overpowered. 
I gave him some melee perks and a unique combat style. He also has the \"light foot\" perk so he won\'t trigger pressure plates. 

He\'s sandboxing in the Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun and you just have to ask him to follow you.  

Please post a comment if you have any problems with him. 

[size=+1][color=red][u][b]Update 0.2:[/b][/u][/color][/size]
I changed his look very slightly and he now wields a unique steel sword which does as much damage as a glass sword and has a powerful damage stamina enchantment. You can also marry him now.

[size=+1][color=red][u][b]Update 1.0 (final):[/b][/u][/color][/size]
Changed his appearance and gave him a new combat style and some perks to make him more useful. Also raised his lvl cap to 60.

Mods I recommend:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488]Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles[/url] (So he looks like in the screenshot. I use the High Res Face Maps by Geonox)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15524]Amazing Follower Tweaks[/url] (The best followers mod imo)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24909]aMidianBorn Book of Silence[/url] (High res retexture of the vanilla armors)
author: Laufknoten2
